discourse_list.title: Dapplets: part2 - project status and standard architecture

content.content: Hello friends, I was quite silent here because I am working on Dapplets Project now. We have implemented some new cool stuff and made (may be controversial?) decision choices. Before the current development phase gets finalized, I would very appreciate all your thought and any feedback. Please find the main article here: Dapplets (part 2): implementation details and development status thank you!
